array.name: homeDesc
array.item: Completed on-campus studies and currently taking distance education courses to complete a Master\'s Degree in Computer Science (Available for full-time, W-2 employment).

Languages: JavaScript, Java, VB.NET
Web: HTML, CSS, jQuery, Bootstrap, Express.js, React, Redux
Web Services: REST, AWS
Web and Application Servers: IIS
Frameworks: ASP.NET, Spring Boot, Hibernate
Databases: MS SQL, MySQL
Design Patterns: Singleton
SDLC: Waterfall, Agile/ Scrum
Tools: Git, VS Code, Visual Studio 2019, StarUML, Postman, Docker, Google Analytics, Adobe Photoshop, SortSite (Web Interface Standard Checker), Sublime Text, Visual Source Safe
Platforms: Windows

resources.string: Knowledgeable web developer with over 7 years of experience playing key role in systems analysis, and front-end / back-end development and design of enterprise applications. Hands-on expertise spanning ASP.NET, VB.NET, C#.NET, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and MS SQL. Talented and personable team player with track record of success collaborating with diverse cross-functional and technical teams.
Master of Science in Computer Science
Master of Science in Information Studies
Bachelor of Science in Computer Science (Honours)
